comment: A070165(a(n),k) = n for some k with 1 <= k <= A006577(a(n)).
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Index entries for sequences related to 3x+1 (or Collatz) problem
example: n = 11: rows 12 and 14 of A070165 don't contain 11, but 14 does:
mathematica: Collatz[n_] := NestWhileList[If[EvenQ[#], #/2, 3 # + 1] &, n, # > 1 &]; Join[{1}, Table[k = n + 1; While[! MemberQ[Collatz[k], n], k++]; k, {n, 100}]] (* _T. D. Noe_, May 28 2013 *)
